name: My Popsicle Maker ! – The Best Frozen Ice Cream Shop in Town by Fun Free Kids Games
name_original: My Popsicle Maker ! – The Best Frozen Ice Cream Shop in Town by Fun Free Kids Games
description:
Cool Sweet Fun For The Entire Family!

Tons of Designs - Loads of Flavors - Numerous Accessories

Design your very own ice pop!
-Pick your favorite mold
-Choose from one of the many flavors
-Add a special topping
- FREEZE YOUR POP
-Then personalize with a unique accessories
